product_name: Serfas E-Gel Hybrid with Cutout Saddle - Women's
long_description: The Serfas E-Gel Hybrid saddle features gel padding on the top, a suspension system on the bottom and a see-through anatomic cutout in the middle. In other words, it is one ultra comfortable saddle. Dual Density base features multiple levels of support that maximize comfort. Hybrid Suspension System: a firm foundation and rubber inserts molded into the seat base absorb shock. Soft, open-cell padding merges to denser closed-cell padding to provide a smooth ride. Reactive-gel top layer adds comfort. Deep center groove and anatomic cutout in base protect soft tissues and alleviate pelvic discomfort. Women-specific design for all-around recreational riding.
short_description: The Serfas E-Gel Hybrid saddle features gel padding on the top, a suspension system on the bottom and a see-through anatomic cutout in the middle. In other words, it is one ultra comfortable saddle.
